title: On Her Knees
description: Taylor’s ball-busting, shrewish boss made his life hell. Yet, hidden behind thick glasses, unflattering hairstyle and mannish clothes was a sensual submissive, craving a man’s domination. He discovered her secret at a kinky sex resort. Resort guests hid behind masks, yet Taylor recognized his boss; she didn’t recognize him. He used the opportunity to force her to her knees. Adult Content
author: Maggie Chatterley
